description:
Permit to purchase Mega Potions.
Allows you to purchase the following potion at shops:

Mega Potions

*This item can also be attained normally in-game.

*After installing DLC, start the game or load a save file from the Main Menu to access it.
*This DLC is also available as part of a set. Please be careful not to purchase the same product twice.
name: Purchase Permit: Mega Potion
